item.title: GROUND PROXIMITY WARNING SYSTEM (GPWS) – TEST MODE

numlitem.para: Alternate procedures are established and used,
Boeing Service Bulletin 747-31-2410 or production equivalent is incorporated, and
Repairs are made within two flight days.

note.para: The following EICAS message may be displayed:

numlitem.para: Visual approaches are not authorized with GPWS inoperative. Instrument approach procedures must be used.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: “GPWS TEST MODE INOP”. Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
